import { ArgsTable, Canvas, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs';

import { List } from '../..';
import { DetailSummary } from '../..';

<Meta title="Components/DetailSummary/Intro" component={DetailSummary} />

# DetailSummary

Use within `<li>` elements in a `<List unstyled>` to allow content to be expanded and collapsed

## Example

<Canvas>
  <List unstyled>
    <li>
      <DetailSummary title="expand 1" children={<p>heyo</p>} />
    </li>
    <li>
      <DetailSummary
        title="expand 2"
        children={
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," />
        }
      />
    </li>
  </List>
</Canvas>

## Available Props

<ArgsTable />
